thread.title: Amber

author: Amber
title: Amber
text:
I am always so lost and confused with trying to establish a good electric company. Coming from Cirro (who I DO NOT recommend)
It was extremely pleasant to speak to someone who spoke clearly and in english. She was very kind and personable and lead to me what I believe will be a good choice for my household. I have not yet received my first bill but I am confident the woman I spoke with did her best to place me with the company that will save me the most money. I sincerely appreciate the kindness and knowledge she provided.
